item.title: Sarah add a quote by Marcus Tullius Cicero
item.description: "A room without books is like a body without a soul." -- Marcus Tullius Cicero

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "The man who does not read has no advantage over the man who cannot read." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Mark Twain
item.description: "Whenever you find yourself on the side of the majority, it is time to pause and reflect." -- Mark Twain

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "I am so clever that sometimes I don't understand a single word of what I am saying." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Sarah add a quote by T.E. Lawrence
item.description: "All men dream: but not equally. Those who dream by night in the dusty recesses of their minds wake up in the day to find it was vanity, but the dreamers of the day are dangerous men, for they may act their dreams with open eyes, to make it possible." -- T.E. Lawrence

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Kate Dicamillo
item.description:
"My favorite six letter word is always because it promises so much.
My favorite five letter word is never because it insists on contradicting the promise.
My favorite four letter word is once because it says it happened then.
My favorite three letter word is yes because Iâ€™m just now learning to say it to my heart.
My favorite two letter word is if because it makes all things possible like this:
If not always If not never Then once.
Yes." -- Kate Dicamillo

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "If you hate a person, you hate something in him that is part of yourself. What isn't part of ourselves doesn't disturb us." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "Whoever wants music instead of noise, joy instead of pleasure, soul instead of gold, creative work instead of business, passion instead of foolery, finds no home in this trivial world of ours." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "Without words, without writing and without books there would be no history, there could be no concept of humanity." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "If I know what love is, it is because of you." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "Words do not express thoughts very well. They always become a little different immediately after they are expressed, a little distorted, a little foolish." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Gautama Buddha
item.description: "Three things can not hide for long: the Moon, the Sun and the Truth." -- Gautama Buddha

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Herman Hesse
item.description: "Some of us think holding on makes us strong but sometimes it is letting go" -- Herman Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "Oh, love isn't there to make us happy. I believe it exists to show us how much we can endure." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "I have been and still am a seeker, but I have ceased to question stars and books; I have begun to listen to the teaching my blood whispers to me." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Herman Hesse
item.description: "I live in my dreams â€” that's what you sense. Other people live in dreams, but not in their own. That's the difference." -- Herman Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "In eternity there is no time, only an instant long enough for a joke." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "My real self wanders elsewhere, far away, wanders on and on invisibly and has nothing to do with my life." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "We are sun and moon, dear friend; we are sea and land. It is not our purpose to become each other; it is to recognize each other, to learn to see the other and honor him for what he is: each the other's opposite and complement." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "When dealing with the insane, the best method is to pretend to be sane." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Hermann Hesse
item.description: "Words do not express thoughts very well. they always become a little different immediately they are expressed, a little distorted, a little foolish. And yet it also pleases me and seems right that what is of value and wisdom to one man seems nonsense to another." -- Hermann Hesse

item.title: Sarah add a quote by Andy Warhol
item.description: "everything has it's beauty but not everyone sees it" -- Andy Warhol
